snippet: The Libyan National Oil Company declared the oil fields nonoperational because of “theft, looting, sabotage and destruction” by “unidentified armed groups.”
abstract: Libyan National Oil Company says violence in country has left 11 of its oil fields nonoperational, which could prevent fulfillment of certain contracts with international oil companies.
lead_paragraph: The Libyan National Oil Company declared the oil fields nonoperational because of “theft, looting, sabotage and destruction” by “unidentified armed groups.”

headline.main: Attacks Cripple 11 Oil Fields, Libya Says
headline.print_headline: Attacks Cripple 11 Oil Fields, Libya Says

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
